text: Gordon Reid was the defending champion, but lost in the quarterfinals to Joachim Gérard. Gustavo Fernández won the title, defeating Nicolas Peifer in the final, 3–6, 6–2, 6–0. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== == References == ;General * Drawsheets on ausopen.com ;Specific Category:2017 Australian Open Australian Open, 2017 Men's Singles
title: 2017 Australian Open – Wheelchair Men's Singles
